name: Powering Fan Experiences Through Digital Pressings with Serenade - W3CS S1.E5

{"name": "Powering Fan Experiences Through Digital Pressings with Serenade - W3CS S1.E5 1/25", "description": "The Web3 Creator Show Season 1 Episode 5 welcomes Max Shand, the founder and CEO of Serenade and Josh Dalton, Serenadeb�s Community Manager! Serenade powers the modern fan experience by drawing artists and fans closer together. They are a music company utilizing web3 technology to achieve a direct artist to fan outcome. Through NFTs, or what they call Digital Pressings, they are focused on creating a new format for music collecting and consumption.
